Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Mr. Siggard's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he had a wife . They lived on a farm and had at least one horse .
Post-Apocalypse[]: Rick Grimes stops at Siggard's Farm hoping there would be some gas available. Rick looks into the window only to find the corpses of Mr. and Mrs. Siggard.
Death[]: Killed By Himself (Suicide) Mr. Siggard had possibly shot his wife and then killed himself, as an act of desperation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Mr. Siggard has killed: Mrs. Siggard (Possibly, Out of Mercy) Himself (Suicide) Possibly a few zombies
Relationships[]: Mrs. Siggard † - Wife and Possible Out of Mercy Victim Siggard Family Horse † - Pet
